description:
Inspired by legendary wall routes that expose your hide to direct sun all day. This collared shirt protects your neck, is breathable and looks good on big walls, boulders, hikes, or hanging in Camp 4.

  • Made of stretchy nylon and spandex that is quick-drying and wicking
  • Tonal ring snap front closure with left Welt Chest Snap Pocket
  • AirVent™ Inner Back Yoke
  • Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection
name: Outdoor Research Astroman Long Sleeve Sun Shirt - Men's
